organizations: TravelCenters of America Acquires Convenience Stores

thread.title: TravelCenters of America Acquires Convenience Stores in Western Wisconsin
thread.title_full: TravelCenters of America Acquires Convenience Stores in Western Wisconsin

title: TravelCenters of America Acquires Convenience Stores in Western Wisconsin
text:
TravelCenters of America Acquires Convenience Stores in Western Wisconsin October 15, 2015 09:34 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
WESTLAKE, Ohio--( BUSINESS WIRE )--TravelCenters of America LLC (TravelCenters), announced it completed yesterday its previously disclosed acquisition of convenience stores located in Western Wisconsin. Seven stores were acquired yesterday and one additional store may be acquired, if the seller satisfies certain closing conditions. TravelCenters has begun to operate all of the stores. TravelCenters expects these convenience stores, formerly known as Stop-A-Sec, will be rebranded as Minit Mart convenience stores and that they will undergo improvements in the coming months. 
About Minit Mart and TravelCenters of America LLC 
TravelCenters of America LLC (TravelCenters), headquartered in Westlake, Ohio, is a leading travel center business in 43 states and Canada operating under the TA® and Petro Stopping Centers® brands. With 252 convenient full-service locations off interstate highway exits, TA and Petro Stopping Centers offer customers diesel and gasoline fueling services, more than 500 full- and quick-service restaurants, 24-hour convenience stores, heavy truck maintenance services, RoadSquad Connect™ (24/7/365 emergency roadside service), Reserve-It™ (truck parking reservations), and many other services – all within large, high traffic facilities. TravelCenters also operates gasoline/convenience stores primarily under the Minit Mart brand name. Minit Mart operates in seven states and offers the cleanest restrooms, a wide variety of quick dining options, branded gasoline, and our signature World Blends Coffee. For more information on TravelCenters, TA, and Petro Stopping Centers, please visit www.ta-petro.com . For more information on Minit Mart, please visit www.minitmart.com . Contacts
